privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: How Blok Blok Studio collects, uses, and protects your personal data
privacy.intro_content: At Blok Blok Studio, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services.
privacy.data_collection_intro: We collect information you provide directly to us when you fill out forms on our website:
privacy.data_use_intro: We use the information we collect to:
privacy.use_item_respond: Respond to your inquiries and provide requested services
privacy.use_item_marketing: Send marketing communications (only with your explicit consent)
privacy.third_parties_intro: We use the following third-party services to operate our business:
privacy.third_party_telegram: Telegram — for internal team notifications (limited to name and email)
privacy.third_parties_note: These services only receive the minimum data necessary for their functionality.
privacy.retention_content: We retain your personal data for as long as necessary to provide our services and maintain our business relationship. You can request deletion of your data at any time through our Data Rights page.
privacy.your_rights_intro: Under the General Data Protection Regulation, you have the right to:
privacy.right_access: Access — Request a copy of all personal data we hold about you
privacy.right_correct: Rectification — Request correction of inaccurate data
privacy.right_delete: Erasure — Request permanent deletion of your data
privacy.right_object: Object — Object to processing of your data
privacy.right_export: Portability — Export your data in a machine-readable format
privacy.right_withdraw: Withdraw Consent — Withdraw your consent at any time

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.description: How Blok Blok Studio uses cookies and similar technologies
cookies.intro_content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help websites remember your preferences and improve your browsing experience.
cookies.our_use_content: We take a privacy-first approach. Currently, we do not use tracking or analytics cookies. We only use localStorage (a browser storage mechanism) to remember your cookie consent preference.
cookies.third_party_content: We do not currently use any third-party analytics, advertising, or tracking services. No third-party cookies are set when you visit our website.
cookies.control_content: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to block or delete cookies. Note that clearing localStorage will reset your cookie consent preference.
cookies.updates_content: If we begin using analytics or tracking technologies in the future, we will update this policy and notify you through our cookie consent banner before any tracking occurs.
